header.name: AYOUB ERRACHIDI
header.description: Creator of modern and high-performance web experiences. Passionate about innovation and transforming ideas into digital solutions.

about.title: Who Am I ?
about.bio: Based in Casablanca, I am a passionate Full Stack Developer focused on creating modern and high-performance web applications. My goal is to transform ideas into innovative and user-centered digital experiences.
expertise: Full stack expertise: React, Node.js, Laravel.
Design of modern and responsive interfaces.
about.professional_experience:
Internship – Bolt System, Casablanca (April 2025 – May 2025)
Development of a web application for managing law firms (React, Express.js, MongoDB) and a mobile application with Flutter.

education.text: Specialized Technician Diploma in Digital Development – CFP Hassania, Casablanca.
First year in Mathematical Sciences, Informatics and Applications – Faculty of Sciences Ben M’Sik, Casablanca.
Baccalaureate in Physical Sciences – Hassan II High School, Casablanca.

about.quote: Always curious, I explore new technologies and take on challenges to push the boundaries of the web.
